channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Domino
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Domino

item.title: CVE-2022-38660|2024-08-03T11:02:14.565Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20domino
item.description: HCL XPages applications are susceptible to a Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform actions in the application on behalf of the logged in user. Â

item.title: CVE-2022-38654|2024-08-03T11:02:14.520Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20domino
item.description: HCL Domino is susceptible to an information disclosure vulnerability. In some scenarios, local calls made on the server to search the Domino directory will ignore xACL read restrictions. An authenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to access attributes from a user's person record.
